gov.ornl.keva.table

Class TableValueFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.ornl.keva.table.TableValueFactory

  • public class TableValueFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Generate table values. This is useful since there may be many different types of table value implementations. In the future, we will support user-defined implementations. For now, we only support embedded, external, and delete operations.
